p: The RMSE of the habitat suitability assessment for S. sphenanthera is 0.056 and the R-squared is 0.76, indicating that the simulation values are highly consistent with the observed values. Therefore, the model was built in the study is accurate and available. Moreover, the RMSE is 0.075 and the R-squared is 0.68 for the data from the 60 sample sites outside of the Qinling Mountains district, which demonstrates that the model is applicable to other areas besides the Qinling Mountains.
